verses.verse: In the <S%H2298>first<s%> <S%H8140>year<s%> of <S%H1113>Belshazzar<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H2370>had<s%> a <S%H2493>dream<s%> and <S%H2376>visions<s%> of his <S%H7217>head<s%> on his <S%H4903>bed:<s%> <S%H116>then<s%> he <S%H3790>wrote<s%> the <S%H2493>dream,<s%> and <S%H560>told<s%> the <S%H7217>sum<s%> of the <S%H4406>matters.<s%>

<S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H6032>spoke<s%> and <S%H560>said,<s%> I <S%H2370>saw<s%> in my <S%H2376>vision<s%> by <S%H3916>night,<s%> and, <S%H718>behold,<s%> the <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H7308>winds<s%> of the <S%H8065>heaven<s%> <S%H1519>strove<s%> on the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H3221>sea.<s%>
And <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H7260>great<s%> <S%H2423>beasts<s%> <S%H5559>came<s%> up from the <S%H3221>sea,<s%> <S%H8133>diverse<s%> <S%H1668>one<s%> from <S%H1668>another.<s%>

The <S%H6933>first<s%> was like a <S%H738>lion,<s%> and had <S%H5403>eagle's<s%> <S%H1611>wings:<s%> I <S%H2370>beheld<s%> <S%H934><s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H1611>wings<s%> thereof were <S%H4804>plucked,<s%> and it was <S%H5191>lifted<s%> up from the <S%H772>earth,<s%> and made <S%H6966>stand<s%> on the <S%H7271>feet<s%> as a <S%H606>man,<s%> and a <S%H606>man's<s%> <S%H3825>heart<s%> was <S%H3052>given<s%> to it.

And <S%H718>behold<s%> <S%H317>another<s%> <S%H2423>beast,<s%> a <S%H8578>second,<s%> <S%H1821>like<s%> to a <S%H1678>bear,<s%> and it <S%H6966>raised<s%> up itself on <S%H2298>one<s%> <S%H7859>side,<s%> and it had <S%H8532>three<s%> <S%H5967>ribs<s%> in the <S%H6433>mouth<s%> of it <S%H997>between<s%> the <S%H8128>teeth<s%> of it: and they <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H3652>thus<s%> to it, <S%H6966>Arise,<s%> <S%H399>devour<s%> <S%H7690>much<s%> <S%H1321>flesh.<s%>

<S%H870>After<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> I <S%H2370>beheld,<s%> <S%H934><s%> and <S%H718>see<s%> <S%H317>another,<s%> like a <S%H5245>leopard,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> had on the <S%H1355>back<s%> of it <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H1611>wings<s%> of a <S%H5776>fowl;<s%> the <S%H2423>beast<s%> had also <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H7217>heads;<s%> and <S%H7985>dominion<s%> was <S%H3052>given<s%> to it.

<S%H870>After<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> I <S%H2370>saw<s%> in the <S%H3916>night<s%> <S%H2376>visions,<s%> and <S%H718>behold<s%> a <S%H7244>fourth<s%> <S%H2423>beast,<s%> <S%H1763>dreadful<s%> and <S%H574>terrible,<s%> and <S%H8624>strong<s%> <S%H3493>exceedingly;<s%> and it had <S%H7260>great<s%> <S%H6523>iron<s%> <S%H8128>teeth:<s%> it <S%H399>devoured<s%> and <S%H1855>broke<s%> in pieces, and <S%H7512>stamped<s%> the <S%H7606>residue<s%> with the <S%H7271>feet<s%> of it: and it was <S%H8133>diverse<s%> from <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> that were <S%H6925>before<s%> it; and it had <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H7162>horns.<s%>

I <S%H7920>considered<s%> the <S%H7162>horns,<s%> and, <S%H431>behold,<s%> there <S%H5559>came<s%> up <S%H997>among<s%> them <S%H317>another<s%> <S%H2192>little<s%> <S%H7162>horn,<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> whom there were <S%H8532>three<s%> of the <S%H6933>first<s%> <S%H7162>horns<s%> <S%H6132>plucked<s%> up by the <S%H6132>roots:<s%> and, <S%H431>behold,<s%> in <S%H1668>this<s%> <S%H7162>horn<s%> were <S%H5870>eyes<s%> like the <S%H5870>eyes<s%> of <S%H606>man,<s%> and a <S%H6433>mouth<s%> <S%H4449>speaking<s%> <S%H7260>great<s%> things.

I <S%H2370>beheld<s%> <S%H934><s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H3764>thrones<s%> were <S%H7412>cast<s%> down, and the <S%H6268>Ancient<s%> of <S%H3118>days<s%> did <S%H3488>sit,<s%> whose <S%H3831>garment<s%> was white as <S%H8517>snow,<s%> and the <S%H8177>hair<s%> of his <S%H7217>head<s%> like the <S%H5343>pure<s%> <S%H6015>wool:<s%> his <S%H3764>throne<s%> was like the <S%H5135>fiery<s%> <S%H7631>flame,<s%> and his <S%H1535>wheels<s%> as <S%H1815>burning<s%> <S%H5135>fire.<s%>

A <S%H5135>fiery<s%> <S%H5103>stream<s%> <S%H5047>issued<s%> and <S%H5312>came<s%> <S%H5312>forth<s%> from <S%H6925>before<s%> him: <S%H506>thousand<s%> <S%H506>thousands<s%> <S%H8120>ministered<s%> to him, and <S%H7240>ten<s%> <S%H7240>thousand<s%> times <S%H7240>ten<s%> <S%H7240>thousand<s%> <S%H6966>stood<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> him: the <S%H1780>judgment<s%> was <S%H3488>set,<s%> and the <S%H5609>books<s%> were <S%H6606>opened.<s%>

I <S%H2370>beheld<s%> <S%H934><s%> <S%H116>then<s%> <S%H4481>because<s%> of the <S%H7032>voice<s%> of the <S%H7260>great<s%> <S%H4406>words<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> the <S%H7162>horn<s%> <S%H4449>spoke:<s%> I <S%H2370>beheld<s%> <S%H934><s%> <S%H5705>even<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H2423>beast<s%> was <S%H6992>slain,<s%> and his <S%H1655>body<s%> <S%H7>destroyed,<s%> and <S%H3052>given<s%> to the <S%H3346>burning<s%> <S%H785>flame.<s%>

As concerning the <S%H7606>rest<s%> of the <S%H2423>beasts,<s%> they had their <S%H7985>dominion<s%> <S%H5709>taken<s%> <S%H5709>away:<s%> yet their <S%H2417>lives<s%> were <S%H754>prolonged<s%> <S%H3052><s%> for a <S%H2166>season<s%> and <S%H5732>time.<s%>

I <S%H2370>saw<s%> in the <S%H3916>night<s%> <S%H2376>visions,<s%> and, <S%H718>behold,<s%> one like the <S%H1247>Son<s%> of <S%H606>man<s%> <S%H858>came<s%> <S%H1934><s%> with the <S%H6050>clouds<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> and <S%H4291>came<s%> to the <S%H6268>Ancient<s%> of <S%H3118>days,<s%> and they <S%H7127>brought<s%> him <S%H7127>near<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> him.

And there was <S%H3052>given<s%> him <S%H7985>dominion,<s%> and <S%H3367>glory,<s%> and a <S%H4437>kingdom,<s%> that <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H5972>people,<s%> <S%H524>nations,<s%> and <S%H3961>languages,<s%> should <S%H6399>serve<s%> him: his <S%H7985>dominion<s%> is an <S%H5957>everlasting<s%> <S%H7985>dominion,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> shall not <S%H5709>pass<s%> <S%H5709>away,<s%> and his <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> that <S%H1768>which<s%> shall not be <S%H2255>destroyed.<s%>

I <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> was <S%H3735>grieved<s%> in my <S%H7308>spirit<s%> in the <S%H1459>middle<s%> of my <S%H5085>body,<s%> and the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of my <S%H7217>head<s%> <S%H927>troubled<s%> me.

I <S%H7127>came<s%> <S%H7127>near<s%> to <S%H2298>one<s%> of them that <S%H6966>stood<s%> by, and <S%H1156>asked<s%> him the <S%H3330>truth<s%> of <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H1836>this.<s%> So he <S%H560>told<s%> me, and made me <S%H3046>know<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> of the <S%H4406>things.<s%>

<S%H459>These<s%> <S%H7260>great<s%> <S%H2423>beasts,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> are <S%H703>four,<s%> are <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H4430>kings,<s%> which shall <S%H6966>arise<s%> out of the <S%H772>earth.<s%>

But the <S%H6922>saints<s%> of the <S%H5946>most<s%> <S%H5946>High<s%> shall <S%H6902>take<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom,<s%> and <S%H2631>possess<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> for <S%H5957>ever,<s%> <S%H5705>even<s%> for <S%H5957>ever<s%> and <S%H5957>ever.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> I <S%H6634>would<s%> <S%H3046>know<s%> the <S%H3321>truth<s%> of the <S%H7244>fourth<s%> <S%H2423>beast,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> was <S%H8133>diverse<s%> from <S%H3606>all<s%> the others, <S%H3493>exceeding<s%> <S%H1763>dreadful,<s%> <S%H1768>whose<s%> <S%H8128>teeth<s%> were of <S%H6523>iron,<s%> and his <S%H2953>nails<s%> of <S%H5174>brass;<s%> which <S%H399>devoured,<s%> <S%H1855>broke<s%> in pieces, and <S%H7512>stamped<s%> the <S%H7606>residue<s%> with his <S%H7271>feet;<s%>

And of the <S%H6236>ten<s%> <S%H7162>horns<s%> that were in his <S%H7217>head,<s%> and of the <S%H317>other<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> <S%H5559>came<s%> up, and <S%H4481>before<s%> <S%H6925><s%> <S%H4479>whom<s%> <S%H8532>three<s%> <S%H5308>fell;<s%> even of that <S%H7162>horn<s%> that had <S%H5870>eyes,<s%> and a <S%H6433>mouth<s%> that <S%H4449>spoke<s%> <S%H7260>very<s%> <S%H7260>great<s%> things, whose <S%H2376>look<s%> was <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H7229>stout<s%> <S%H4481>than<s%> his <S%H2273>fellows.<s%>
I <S%H2370>beheld,<s%> <S%H934><s%> and the <S%H1797>same<s%> <S%H7162>horn<s%> <S%H5648>made<s%> <S%H7129>war<s%> with the <S%H6922>saints,<s%> and <S%H3202>prevailed<s%> against them;

<S%H5704>Until<s%> the <S%H6268>Ancient<s%> of <S%H3118>days<s%> <S%H858>came,<s%> and <S%H1780>judgment<s%> was <S%H3052>given<s%> to the <S%H6922>saints<s%> of the <S%H5946>most<s%> <S%H5946>High;<s%> and the <S%H2166>time<s%> <S%H4291>came<s%> that the <S%H6922>saints<s%> <S%H2631>possessed<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom.<s%>

<S%H3652>Thus<s%> he <S%H560>said,<s%> The <S%H7244>fourth<s%> <S%H2423>beast<s%> shall be the <S%H7244>fourth<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> on <S%H772>earth,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> shall be <S%H8133>diverse<s%> from <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H4437>kingdoms,<s%> and shall <S%H399>devour<s%> the <S%H3606>whole<s%> <S%H772>earth,<s%> and shall <S%H1759>tread<s%> it down, and <S%H1854>break<s%> it in pieces.

And the <S%H6236>ten<s%> <S%H7162>horns<s%> out of this <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> are <S%H6236>ten<s%> <S%H4430>kings<s%> that shall <S%H6966>arise:<s%> and <S%H321>another<s%> shall <S%H6966>rise<s%> <S%H311>after<s%> them; and he shall be <S%H8133>diverse<s%> from the <S%H6933>first,<s%> and he shall <S%H8214>subdue<s%> <S%H8532>three<s%> <S%H4430>kings.<s%>

And he shall <S%H4449>speak<s%> great <S%H4406>words<s%> <S%H6655>against<s%> the <S%H5943>most<s%> <S%H5943>High,<s%> and shall <S%H1080>wear<s%> out the <S%H6922>saints<s%> of the <S%H5946>most<s%> <S%H5946>High,<s%> and <S%H5452>think<s%> to <S%H8133>change<s%> <S%H2166>times<s%> and <S%H1882>laws:<s%> and they shall be <S%H3052>given<s%> into his <S%H3028>hand<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> a <S%H5732>time<s%> and <S%H5732>times<s%> and the <S%H6387>dividing<s%> of <S%H5732>time.<s%>

But the <S%H1780>judgment<s%> shall <S%H3488>sit,<s%> and they shall <S%H5709>take<s%> <S%H5709>away<s%> his <S%H7985>dominion,<s%> to <S%H8046>consume<s%> and to <S%H7>destroy<s%> it to the <S%H5491>end.<s%>

And the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> and <S%H7985>dominion,<s%> and the <S%H7238>greatness<s%> of the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> <S%H8460>under<s%> the <S%H3606>whole<s%> <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> shall be <S%H3052>given<s%> to the <S%H5972>people<s%> of the <S%H6922>saints<s%> of the <S%H5945>most<s%> <S%H5946>High,<s%> whose <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> is an <S%H5957>everlasting<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom,<s%> and <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H7985>dominions<s%> shall <S%H6399>serve<s%> and <S%H8086>obey<s%> him.

Till <S%H5705>now<s%> <S%H3542><s%> is the <S%H5491>end<s%> of the <S%H4406>matter.<s%> As for me <S%H1841>Daniel,<s%> my <S%H7476>cogitations<s%> <S%H7690>much<s%> <S%H927>troubled<s%> me, and my <S%H2122>countenance<s%> <S%H8133>changed<s%> in me: but I <S%H5202>kept<s%> the <S%H4406>matter<s%> in my <S%H3821>heart.<s%>
